Verses: 1 karththar Novaavai Nokki: Neeyum Un Veettaar Anaivarum Pezhaikkul Pravesiyungal; Indha Sandhadhiyil Unnai Enakku Munbaaga Needhimaanaagak Kanden.
2 boomiyinmeedhengum Viththai Uyirode Kaakkumporuttu, Nee Suththamaana Sagala Mirugangalilum, Aanum Pennumaaga Evvezhu Jodum, Suththamallaadha Mirugangalil Aanum Pennumaaga Ovvoru Jodum,
3 aagaayaththup Paravaigalilum, Sevalum Pedumaaga Evvezhu Jodum Unnidaththil Serththukkol.

4 innum Ezhunaal Sendrapinbu, Naarpadhunaal Iravum Pagalum Boomiyinmel Mazhaiyai Varushikkappanni, Naan Undaakkina Jeevajandhukkal Anaiththaiyum Boomiyinmel Iraadhapadikku Nikkiragam Pannuven Endraar.
5 novaa Thanakkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Seydhaan.
6 jalappralayam Boomiyinmel Undaanapodhu, Novaa Arunooru Vayadhaayirundhaan.
7 jalappralayaththukkuth Thappumpadi Novaavum Avanudanekooda Avan Kumaararum, Avan Manaiviyum, Avan Kumaararin Manaivigalum Pezhaikkul Pravesiththaargal.
8 dhevan Novaavukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Suththamaana Mirugangalilum, Suththamallaadha Mirugangalilum, Boomiyinmel Oorum Praanigal Ellaavatrilum,
9 aanum Pennum Jodu Jodaaga Novaavidaththil Pezhaikkutpattana.
10 ezhunaal Sendrapinbu Boomiyinmel Jalappralayam Undaayitru.
11 novaavukku Arunooraam Vayadhaagum Varusham Irandaam Maadham Padhinezhaam Thedhiyaagiya Annaalile, Magaa Aazhaththin Ootrukkangalellaam Pilandhana; Vaanaththin Madhagugalum Thiravundana.
12 naarpadhunaal Iravum Pagalum Boomiyinmel Perumazhai Peydhadhu.
13 andraiththiname Novaavum, Novaavin Kumaararaagiya Semum Kaamum Yaappeththum, Avargaludanekooda Novaavin Manaiviyum, Avan Kumaararin Moondru Manaivigalum, Pezhaikkul Pravesiththaargal.

14 avargalodu Jaadhijaadhiyaana Sagalavidhak Kaattumirugangalum, Jaadhijaadhiyaana Sagalavidha Naattumirugangalum, Boomiyinmel Oorugira Jaadhijaadhiyaana Sagalavidha Oorum Praanigalum, Jaadhijaadhiyaana Sagalavidhap Paravaigalum, Palavidhamaana Siragugalulla Sagalavidhap Patchigalum Pravesiththana.
15 ippadiye Jeevasuvaasamulla Maamsa Jandhukkalellaam Jodu Jodaaga Novaavidaththil Pezhaikkul Pravesiththana.
16 dhevan Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Aanum Pennumaaga Sagalavidha Maamsajandhukkalum Ulle Pravesiththana; Appozhudhu Karththar Avanai Ullevittuk Kadhavai Adaiththaar.
17 jalappralayam Naarpadhu Naal Boomiyinmel Undaanapodhu, Jalam Perugi, Pezhaiyaik Kilambappannitru; Adhu Boomikkumel Midhandhadhu.
18 jalam Peruvellamaagi, Boomiyinmel Migavum Perugitru; Pezhaiyaanadhu Jalaththinmel Midhandhukondirundhadhu.
19 jalam Boomiyinmel Migavum Adhigamaaip Peruginadhinaal, Vaanaththinkeezh Engumulla Uyarndha Malaigalellaam Moodappattana.
20 moodappatta Malaigalukku Melaaip Padhinaindhumuzha Uyaraththirku Jalam Perugitru.
21 appozhudhu Maamsajandhukkalaagiya Paravaigalum, Naattumirugangalum, Kaattumirugangalum, Boomiyinmel Oorum Praanigal Yaavum, Ellaa Narajeevangalum, Boomiyinmel Sanjarikkiravaigal Yaavum Maandana.
22 vettaandharaiyil Undaana Ellaavatrilum Naasiyile Jeevasuvaasamullavaigal Ellaam Maandupoyina.

23 manushar Mudhal, Mirugangal, Oorum Praanigal, Aagaayaththup Paravaigal Pariyandhamum, Boomiyinmel Irundha Uyirulla Vasthukkal Yaavum Azhindhu, Avaigal Boomiyil Iraadhapadikku Nikkiragamaayina; Novaavum Avanode Pezhaiyilirundha Uyirgalum Maaththiram Kaakkappattana.
24 jalam Boomiyinmel Nootraimbadhu Naal Migavum Pravaagiththukkondirundhadhu.
